Post_Title: My 15F mom wants to have my clitoris removed and my vagina infibulated at a local clinic, I live in Washington State.
post_text:
My mom doesn't like that I masturbate and she wants me infibulated so I don't have sex/unable to masturbate. 

I read on Washington's laws and they say I'm not protected and that my mom can have it performed on me. There's nothing to protect me from my mother forcing this on me if she wants it.

My mom pulled me out of school temporarily and now I'm afraid she means it.

My mom says we're going to the clinic for me to be infibulated in two days. My mom says I have to comply because she is my parent and I can't say no or resist. She says my infibulation and clitoris removal will be done under anesthetic and while I'm unconscious. The person infibulating me is a former doctor, but not an active one. She's planning to have the clinic he used to own cover it up. I'm also Caucasian so is my mom, so she can't take me out of country.

I tried posting on r/legaladvice but my post got deleted in two hours.

Please tell me what I can do, my mom took my phone away so I can't call or text cps or police.

That is sickening!

Just in case this isn’t a fake post: You have the internet so reach out everywhere. You said you don’t have a school yet but that doesn’t matter, just email school counselors anyway of any school, therapists, police stations, news stations, women’s shelters etc. Also, there are no reasons good enough to not run. If reaching out isn’t working, get out of that house! You could die from a surgery like that from a hack doctor. If the local police and neighbors already won’t help then keep running until you’re not local anymore.

copy and paste this post for help everywhere ,see who turns up!

If not hitchhike out or just leave tonight, 6 hours at night will get you pretty far...

She's not entitled to your grace anymore, OP. Break the window. There is nothing in your room not bolted down that you can't throw through a pane of glass. Lamps? Books? A curtain rod? Anything and everything can go through the window. Clear all the glass if you can, in case you can just make an exit.

If you can break a window, you can be heard, and if you can be heard, you can scream "Fire!". Set a little fire if you can, but being honest, no one is going to take a chance on a house fire. If they can't smell smoke, they'll assume it's because they can't smell it yet. Do NOT worry about whether the fire department will be mad about being called to a non-existent fire -- they're there for life or death emergencies, and yours is life or death.

Check out r/runaways if you want to find help running away. Other teens in your area might be able to get you out, if legal resources aren't helpful. A locked window is only as good as the rock used to break it. You absolutely can get out. Running away isn't the best advice, there's plenty of better advice on this thread, but this sub is one more resource for you to explore if all else fails.

If you need a silver lining, also consider that if she goes through with this, then you can file a lawsuit against her, the doctor, and the clinic, after you turn 18. I learned about this due to the nature of my own work. I believe you have until you are 21 to file a lawsuit for harm done to you as a minor. I'm not a lawyer, but you'll need to consult one to file the suit anyway.

For goodness sake though, please do everything you can to get out of this situation. Don't believe her when she says you can't run away. She's been lying to you your entire life. Get out of that house and tell an adult what's going on. Teachers, in particular, are suited to help you.

Wait an hour after they fall asleep tonight. Then leave and go to the police station, they are always there.

See if you can FB msg or tweet the police in the meantime.
